problem.label: What We Do
problem.title: Improving Medication Adherence
problem.subtitle: Taking medication on time is harder than you think
problem.description: More than half of chronic disease patients fail to take their prescribed medications properly. In busy daily lives, people forget medication times or struggle to manage multiple medication schedules.

solution.title: Solved with AI
solution.description: Pillo leverages AI/ML technology to deliver personalized medication reminders. Machine learning-based adherence pattern analysis, AI drug interaction checker, and personalized health insights - an AI healthcare platform beyond simple reminder apps.

target.title: Built for You
target.item2: Busy individuals who often miss medication times
target.item3: Those caring for elderly parents' medication
target.item4: Anyone wanting systematic chronic disease management

testimonials.subtitle: See what our users are saying

items.name: Sarah M.
items.text: It's simple to use and quick! As a busy mom, this app takes the guesswork out of when/if I took my meds. Especially while recovering from surgery.

items.name: Michael R.
items.text: Pillo is marketed as a medication Tracker App. In reality, it is so much more than that. It is a HEALTH APP. Pillo does most of what I need.

items.name: Emily K.
items.text: Extremely easy to use. I love the reminders and how easy it is to push out the time when you need a little flexibility. Highly recommend!
